HOME.TITLE: Santa Claus Shop Registration
HOME.HEADER: A Toy for Every Girl and Boy
HOME.MESSAGE:
Welcome to the Denver Santa Claus Shop Pre-registration where we plan on fulfilling our mission even during the pandemic! This toy give-away program is available to Denver residents on Dec. 11, 12, 14, & 15.

Please follow the prompts to pre-register so that the distribution process can go quickly and save you time the day of the event. This year will be a mobile drive through toy distribution. You will receive toys based on your childâ€™s age and gender.

If this is your first visit to the preregistration page, select "Create Account" and follow the instructions.

If you have already created an account and are visiting to change an existing registration, you will need to select "Sign In" and follow those instructions. Any change or addition will delete the first entry, so be sure to re-enter all information.

We look forward to providing your family with some Holiday cheer during these trying times.

SIGNUP.HEADER: Create your account by filling out the information below
SIGNUP.TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS_AGREE: I agree to the terms and conditions
SIGNUP.PRIVACY_POLICY_AGREE: I have read the privacy policy
SIGNUP.GATES_OPEN: Gates will open at 9am each day to begin line formation
SIGNUP.BRING_ID:
Bring your ID and children's birth certificates
(or other form of id)

REGISTRATION.CODE_HELP: If your code doesn't show up here don't worry! Just check your email and print it from there or try coming back in a few minutes
REGISTRATION.CHANGE_DETAILS: Need to change your registration details?
REGISTRATION.GATES_OPEN: Gates will open at 9am each day to begin line formation
REGISTRATION.BRING_ID:
Bring your ID and children's birth certificates
(or other form of id)
REGISTRATION.PRINT_PAGE: Print or save this page or the email we sent you!
REGISTRATION.YOUR_TICKET: This is your ticket to the event
REGISTRATION.ENTRY_INSTRUCTIONS:
Enter parking lot of Monaco at light All other entrances
will be blocked off to DSCS traffic
REGISTRATION.LETTER_LASTNAME_0: Please use the first letter of your last name to choose your date
REGISTRATION.CHOOSE_DATETIME_INSTRUCTIONS: Choosing a date and time will allow the "Save Date/Time" button to be pressable
REGISTRATION.DATETIME_REMINDER: If you change the date and time remember to save again
REGISTRATION.ADD_CHILD_INSTRUCTIONS_1: Press the blue "Add Child" button to start adding your children
REGISTRATION.ADD_CHILD_INSTRUCTIONS_2: We only have toys for children ages 11 and under
REGISTRATION.ADD_CHILD_INSTRUCTIONS_3: After you add a child you can edit them by clicking on them
REGISTRATION.UPDATE_REGISTRATION_REMINDER: Don't forget to update your registration if you add or change children!
REGISTRATION.MAKE_SURE_DATETIME: Make sure you picked your arrival date and time
REGISTRATION.DOUBLE_CHECK_CHILDREN: Double-Check that all of your children (ages 11 and under) are added
